tool_description: Analyzes guest dietary requirements and restrictions to create a comprehensive dietary needs matrix for menu planning accommodation.

guest_dietary_data.description: Array of dietary restrictions and preferences from guest responses

restriction_categories.description: Specific categories to analyze (allergies, religious, medical, lifestyle)

severity_classification.description: Whether to classify restrictions by severity level

generate_statistics.description: Whether to generate statistical breakdown of dietary needs

error_messages: Empty dietary data: Provide at least one dietary restriction or preference entry.
Invalid restriction categories: Use recognized categories like allergies, religious, medical, or lifestyle.
Data format error: Ensure dietary data entries are properly formatted strings.
Processing limit exceeded: Maximum 1000 guest dietary entries can be processed at once.
usage: Provide guest_dietary_data array with dietary requirements. Optionally specify restriction_categories, severity_classification, and generate_statistics settings. Returns organized dietary needs analysis.

total_guests_analyzed.description: Number of guest dietary profiles processed

restriction_summary.description: Summary of all identified dietary restrictions and their frequencies

high_priority_restrictions.description: Critical restrictions requiring special attention (severe allergies, medical needs)

accommodation_requirements.description: Specific accommodations needed for menu planning
